meanings.definition: The way in which something is arranged or set up.
meanings.sent1: The different configurations of the furniture in the room made it feel cozy.
meanings.sent2: She studied the configurations of the puzzle pieces before starting to solve it.
meanings.sent3: The configurations of the alphabet blocks spelled out a funny word.
meanings.sent4: The configurations of the stars in the sky seemed to form a giant bear.
meanings.sent5: The configurations of the traffic lights helped to keep the cars moving smoothly.

meanings.definition: A particular arrangement or pattern of elements.
meanings.sent1: The configurations of colors in the painting created a beautiful harmony.
meanings.sent2: The different configurations of ingredients in the recipe resulted in unique flavors.
meanings.sent3: The configurations of the flowers in the garden looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The configurations of the clouds in the sky resembled a fluffy dragon.
meanings.sent5: The configurations of the music notes on the page formed a lovely melody.

meanings.definition: The shape or structure of something.
meanings.sent1: The configurations of the building gave it a modern and sleek look.
meanings.sent2: She admired the configurations of the tree branches against the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The configurations of the cake layers made it look like a miniature castle.
meanings.sent4: The configurations of the waves crashing against the shore were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The configurations of the clouds in the sky changed constantly throughout the day.
